name: Way Home (itch) (smeas, Tiinea, MrJackey)
description:
A short little game made for the GMTK game jam 2021.

Find your way home through the dangerous forest with the help of your newfound friend.

Credits

Programming

Jonatan Johansson (smeas)
Jacob Lundberg (MrJackey)

Art

Kristina Jönsson (Tiinea)

External Assets

Music
